subject: Update jest.expo.ts to register setup files
description:
Change setupFiles: [] to setupFiles: ["<rootDir>/jest.setup.pre.js"] and add setupFilesAfterEnv: ["<rootDir>/jest.setup.ts"]. Update JSDoc to reflect that setup files are now managed here.

**Verification:** `grep -c 'setupFiles.*jest.setup.pre.js' expo/copy-overwrite/jest.expo.ts && grep -c 'setupFilesAfterEnv.*jest.setup.ts' expo/copy-overwrite/jest.expo.ts`
